--- title: "Hi There üëã" format: html: toc-title: My Projects toc: true toc-location: right $enable-grid-classes: false $enable-cssgrid: true ---

I'm Gus, a Business Analyst with a few years' experience. I'd like to show you what I do. You can also find me on Twitter @guslipkin or on Medium also @guslipkin. ---- ::: {.column-page} ::: ::: {.grid .column-page} ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-sm-6 .d-grid} ::: {.g-col-12} ## Published on CRAN #### [{cipheR}![](assets/cipher.png){height=40}](https://guslipkin.github.io/cipheR/) ::: ::: {.g-col-12 .text-wrap} - **What:** An R library for simple text ciphers. - **Why:** I needed a Caesar Shift for an [Advent of Code](https://guslipkin.github.io/AdventOfCode/) puzzle and got a bit carried away! - **[How](https://github.com/guslipkin/cipher):** `R` - **Conclusion:** Check it out on [CRAN](https://cran.r-project.org/package=cipheR) ::: ::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-sm-6 .d-grid} ::: {.g-col-12} ## Consulting ::: ::: {.g-col-12 .text-wrap} - **What:** That's up to you! - **Why:** I have a lot to offer you and your company in a variety of fields. - **How:** If you'd like to work with me but, you're not sure where I might fit in, this page and [my r√©sum√©](resume.html) are a great place to start - **Conclusion:** It's time to [contact me](contact.html) and get the ball rolling! ::: ::: ::: ::: {.column-page} ## Data Focused Projects ::: ::: {.grid .column-page} ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-sm-6 .d-grid} ::: {.g-col-12} #### [Disney World Ride Wait Times](../presentations/disney_world_ride_wait_times.html) ::: ::: {.g-col-12 .d-flex .align-items-start} - **What:** Can I find the best time to visit Disney World üè∞ based on ride wait times? - **Why:** Going to Disney can be lots of fun, but waiting in lines is not. - **[How](https://github.com/guslipkin/disney_ds):** `R: {forcats, lubridate, reshape2, tidyverse}` - **Conclusion:** Try going to Epcot on a Wednesday in September. ::: ::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-sm-6 .d-grid} ::: {.g-col-12} #### [Investigating a relationship between climate variables and the spread of COVID-19](../presentations/covid_time_series_gis.html) ::: ::: {.g-col-12} - **What:** Since COVID-19 ü¶† is spread through close contact, do any climate variables influence spread? - **Why:** Human behavior is affected by the weather. If there is adverse weather, is there an increase in spread? - **[How](https://github.com/guslipkin/COVID-TimeSeries-GIS):** `ArcGIS`, `Excel`, `R: {data.table, tidyverse}` - **Conclusion:** Some counties can be modelled very well such as Cook County, Illinois while others, such as Tift County, Georgia, not so much. ::: ::: ::: ::: {.column-page} ## Economic Analysis Focused Projects ::: ::: {.grid .column-page} ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-sm-6 .d-grid} ::: {.g-col-12} #### [Improving Tutoring at Florida Poly](../presentations/tutoring_at_poly.html) ::: ::: {.g-col-12 .text-wrap} - **What:** How can we make tutoring more available to students? - **Why:** Getting tutoring for the classes you need can be difficult, especially when trying to fit it into your schedule. - **[How](https://github.com/guslipkin/Fall2021/tree/main/ECO%203930%20%7E%20Contemporary%20Economics/Final%20Paper):** `‚ú®Math‚ú®` - **Conclusion:** A hybrid model where high demand classes offer group tutoring and all classes have one-on-one tutoring would be most efficient. ::: ::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-sm-6 .d-grid} ::: {.g-col-12} #### [Trader Joe's Cultural and Marketing Plan](../presentations/trader_joes_cultural_marketing_plan.html) ::: ::: {.g-col-12} - **What:** Let's help Trader Joe's enter the Canadian supermarket industry. - **Why:** It's a final project for GEB 3373 ‚Äì International and Comparative Dimensions of Business. - **[How](https://github.com/guslipkin/Spring2021/blob/main/GEB%203373%20%7E%20International%20Comparative%20Dimensions/GEB%203373%20Final%20Project):**`Economic Analysis` and `Game Theory` - **Conclusion:** Trader Joe's has the potential to be a smash hit in the Canadian Supermarket industry. ::: ::: ::: ::: {.column-page} ## Assorted Programming ::: ::: {.grid .column-page} ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-sm-6 .d-grid} ::: {.g-col-12} #### [{dewey}![](assets/dewey.svg){height=40}](https://guslipkin.github.io/dewey/) ::: ::: {.g-col-12 .text-wrap} - **What:** A collection of useful `R` functions for data analysis - **Why:** There were some things I wanted to do and they didn't exist yet, so I made them - **[How](https://github.com/guslipkin/dewey):** `R: {data.table, parallel, pkgdown, stats}` - **Conclusion:** Development is difficult, but I'm proud of it and it's super useful ::: ::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-sm-6 .d-grid} ::: {.g-col-12} #### [Advent of Code](https://guslipkin.github.io/AdventOfCode/) ::: ::: {.g-col-12} - **What:** A series of programming puzzles to help save Christmas. - **Why:** Christmas must be saved! But also, it's a lot of fun and requires a variety of different solution styles. - **[How](https://github.com/guslipkin/AdventOfCode):** `R: {*puzzle dependent*}`, `Quarto` - **Conclusion:** I highly recommend joining if you like a good challenge. ::: ::: ::: ::: {.column-page} ## Other Projects ::: ::: {.grid .column-page} ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-sm-6 .d-grid} ::: {.g-col-12} #### [Gus' Good Spreadsheet Guide](../presentations/spreadsheet_guide.html) ::: ::: {.g-col-12 .text-wrap} - **What:** A slideshow with guidelines for high quality spreadsheets - **Why:** Sometimes people ask for help with spreadsheets and it's easier to help with consistent design - **How:** `Microsoft PowerPoint` - **Conclusion:** While it is by no means exhaustive, it's a good start and I hope someone finds it useful ::: ::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-sm-6 .d-grid} ::: {.g-col-12} #### [Cat Simulator 2019](../presentations/cat_simulator_2019.html) ::: ::: {.g-col-12} - **What:** Can we make a game that teaches basic Bash commands? - **Why:** It's a final project for COP 3353C ‚Äì Introduction to Unix. - **[How](https://github.com/guslipkin/Lark):** `Bash` - **Conclusion:** It's lots of fun. I highly recommend it! ::: ::: :::
